channel.title: ABEJAPlatform on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in ABEJAPlatform on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Create a machine learning app with ABEJA Platform + LINE Bot
item.description: This article is from the second day of [ABEJA Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/abeja). Last year’s ABEJA Platform Advent Calendarsaid,“SummaryofABEJAPlatformauthentication”, I introduced the authentication of API calls on the ABEJA Platform, but I wrote it again this year on the ABEJA Platform newsletter. Unfortunately, the ABEJA Platform does not support Elixir, so all the code is written in Python. Overview Posted in July 2019 by @yushin_n"CreatemachinelearningapplicationwithABEJAPlatform+CloudFunctions+LINEBot'’, ABEJA Platform Google Cloud Functions LINE Bot The theme was to create a serverless machine learning application by combining.
